We live in the same household and sit in the same room as each other for more than 15 minutes, so clearly isn't that.
replyContent: The app uses Bluetooth Low Energy to assess whether the users are in close physical proximity (2m or closer), for 15mins or greater, in any single encounter. In cases where individuals are in the same household, if the devices do not meet this criteria, then no notification will be sent.
